title: Rounded techno-ish font
content:
Anyone able to identify the font that the "M" in this image?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [M](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012025552/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-01-31%20at%2023.18.58.jpg) | 74.26 KB |
author: ehmahyah

comments.content:
well, given the lack of context & other source material i'd say this:

probably not a font. likely a logo.  
and  
considering the content surrounding it, might be a stylized Euro symbol? (turned on its side)

well, yeah :)  
rather impressive that someone went to that kind of effort, in a strange way.

You guys should see what it takes to make a text face!

And to be fair, even trying to make something like Freshbot -from scratch- would open your eyes.

hhp
A 4-legged M is something to open my eyes all right.
